response.overview: Experience the transformative sound of The Beatles’ “Rubber Soul” with the unparalleled clarity of DTS-HD Master Audio 7.1 Surround mix on Blu-ray. Released in 1965, this album marked a significant artistic leap for the band, blending folk rock, pop, and soul influences. Featuring timeless tracks like “Norwegian Wood,” “In My Life,” and “Drive My Car,” “Rubber Soul” showcases The Beatles’ evolving lyrical sophistication and innovative use of instruments like the sitar and harmonium.  With DTS-HD MA Surround, every nuance of the album is delivered with stunning precision, enveloping you in a rich, multi-dimensional audio experience. The high-definition audio format preserves the intricate arrangements and pioneering recording techniques, offering an immersive listening experience for audiophiles and Beatles fans alike.
response.title: The Beatles’ “Rubber Soul” DTS-HD MA
